title: 1939년 Henderson v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Henderson v. State. 판결일: 1939-01-25. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: D. R. HENDERSON v. STATE
**판결일**: 1939-01-25
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Morrow

## 변호인

M. E. Cain, of Liberty, for appellant., Lloyd W: Davidson, .State’s Atty., of-Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 130 S.W.2d 1117

## 판결문 요약


MORROW, Presiding Judge.
The offense is forgery; penalty assessed at confinement in the penitentiary for two years.
Upon the written request of the appellant, duly verified by his affidavit, the appeal is dismissed.
...
